channel.description: Recent content in Initiatives on Psintica

item.title: Astronomy Project Cohort 1
item.description: This is the first batch of students doing the project on Astronomy, led by Aman Kumar(amanasci). The project goes through a variety of topics and tries to teach very fundamental tools and techniques one requires while getting involved in an astronomy project. Hopefully this will help them learn new things. Project : Classification of Galaxies List of students : Coming soon….

item.title: Biology Project Group by Dr. Amit Khurana
item.description: This is our second mentoring group, being led by Dr. Amit Khurana. More deatils coming soon.
